## Results

The results of nonrank-based algorithm are compared to the approaches from @klein: independent and Bonferroni.

```{r}
source("/home/realiseshewon/PDev/kde-ranking/R/preprocess_data.R")
source("/home/realiseshewon/PDev/kde-ranking/R/create_table.R")


equicorr <- FALSE

combined <- combine_summaries(
  "/home/realiseshewon/PDev/kde-ranking/simulation_results/summaries/summary_block",
  equicorr
)


tabletest <- preprocess_coverage(combined, 2, equicorrelation = equicorr)
create_table_for_coverage(preprocess_coverage(combined, 2, equicorr), equicorr)

create_table_for_coverage(preprocess_coverage(combined, 3.6, equicorr), equicorr)

create_table_for_coverage(preprocess_coverage(combined, 6, equicorr), equicorr)
```

\blandscape

```{r}
tabb <- preprocess_tightness_measure(combined, "t1", equicorr)

if (!equicorr) {
  tabb <- tabb %>% select(-c(r, blocks))
}

create_table_for_tightness_measure(
  summary=tabb,
  metric_type="T1", equicorr)
```
